tools.name: github_list_repos
tools.description: List repositories for authenticated user or organization

tools.name: github_list_repo_languages
tools.description: List programming languages used in repository

tools.name: github_list_repo_teams
tools.description: List teams with access to repository

tools.name: github_get_pull_request_merge_status
tools.description: Check if PR can be merged

tools.name: github_check_following
tools.description: Check if user follows another user

tools.name: neon_list_projects
tools.description: Lists the first 10 Neon projects. Increase limit or use search to filter.

tools.name: neon_list_organizations
tools.description: Lists all organizations the user has access to.

tools.name: neon_list_shared_projects
tools.description: Lists projects shared with the current user.

tools.name: neon_get_project_operations
tools.description: List recent operations on a project.

tools.name: neon_clone_project
tools.description: Clone entire project with all branches.

tools.name: neon_get_project_permissions
tools.description: List users/roles with access to project.

tools.name: neon_describe_branch
tools.description: Get tree view of all objects in a branch.

tools.name: neon_run_sql_transaction
tools.description: Execute multiple SQL statements in a transaction.

tools.name: neon_prepare_database_migration
tools.description: Prepare database migration in temporary branch.

tools.name: neon_complete_database_migration
tools.description: Complete and apply migration to main branch.

tools.name: neon_create_project_for_rad
tools.description: Create Neon project specifically for RAD Crawler system with optimal settings.

tools.name: neon_deploy_schema
tools.description: Deploy SQL schema file to database. Supports multi-statement SQL files.

tools.name: neon_verify_schema
tools.description: Verify that required tables exist in database.

tools.name: neon_get_connection_uri
tools.description: Get full PostgreSQL connection URI for application use.

tools.name: neon_setup_rad_database
tools.description: Complete autonomous setup: create project, database, deploy schema, verify. Returns connection URI.

tools.name: neon_check_api_key
tools.description: Check if Neon API key is configured and valid.

tools.name: neon_provision_neon_auth
tools.description: Provision Neon Auth with Stack Auth integration.

tools.name: neon_list_api_keys
tools.description: List all API keys for the account.

tools.name: neon_list_read_replicas
tools.description: List all read replicas for a branch.

tools.name: neon_get_connection_uri
tools.description: Get formatted connection URI for different clients.

tools.name: neon_test_connection
tools.description: Test database connection and return latency.

tools.name: neon_get_connection_examples
tools.description: Get code examples for connecting to database.

tools.name: neon_export_metrics
tools.description: Export metrics to external monitoring system.

tools.name: google_drive_get_start_page_token
tools.description: Get start page token for changes

tools.name: redis_get
tools.description: Get value by key from Redis

tools.name: redis_memory_usage
tools.description: Get memory usage for a specific key

tools.name: redis_flush_db
tools.description: Clear all keys in current database (DANGEROUS)

tools.name: openai_chat_completion
tools.description: Create a chat completion with GPT models (GPT-4, GPT-3.5, etc.)

tools.name: openai_get_model_pricing
tools.description: Get current pricing for a model

tools.name: sequential_thinking
tools.description: Record a step in sequential reasoning process

tools.name: parallel_thinking
tools.description: Explore multiple reasoning branches in parallel

tools.name: reflective_thinking
tools.description: Reflect on and improve previous thoughts

tools.name: context7_resolve_library_id
tools.description: Resolves a package/product name to a Context7-compatible library ID and returns a list of matching libraries.
